name: Tom's 4x4: Mountain Park
description:
From the creators of Tom's 4x4 comes a brand new adventure. Prepare yourself for a new level of radical. Prove your offroad skills to meet daring obstacles and solve physics puzzles. Fine tune your vehicle performance to meet the track's demands.
Tom's 4x4 Mountain Park will immerse you in a challenging offroad world
with beautiful environments and detailed vehicles.

Features:
30 challenging levels.
More level packs in development!
10 offroad vehicles.
9 Upgrades per vehicle.
Awesome graphics.
Super realistic physics!

Adjustable Upgrades:
Front Spring
Front Damper
Rear Spring
Rear Damper
Front Wheel Radius
Rear Wheel Radius
Suspension
Engine Torque Curve
Transmission

This is the game you've been waiting for.
Say goodbye to your free time, Tom's 4x4: Mountain Park is a ride you will never forget!
